text: 1/8 #COVID19 in #Israel is better, much because of the #vaccine. As you can see, deaths and hospitalizations are going down. However, lockdown may be the main cause. Here I try to sort the data and find clear vaccine effects. Attached are my impressions a moment before, Jan 6. https://t.co/RNDe5Dd8h5 https://t.co/JM1YHpkxsr
